pages.text: An ocean of infinite possibilities lies within $(item)sapphire$(), literally. Holding it in my hands feels unlike any mineral Iâ€™ve held before, seeming to be a solid in form but a liquid in sensation. I felt a sense of longing within this material, like it wanted to leave it solid state and explore the world freely.

Being aquatic in nature, I was able to hold my breath for extended periods of time underwater and other assorted $(thing)water-based abilities$(). The utility applications for this particular gem seems plentiful. The tools crafted allow you to $(thing)explore land much easier$(), like you're flowing across the terrain. I feel free when using sapphire. It makes me want to explore this world and see what else it has to offer.
